scripts.run: pnpm build && mkdir -p .local && APP_DB_PATH=$(pwd)/.local/app.sqlite RENDERER_DIST=$(pwd)/apps/renderer/dist electron apps/electron/dist/main/index.js
scripts.arch:check: node --import tsx scripts/check-architecture.ts && node --import tsx scripts/check-no-mocks.ts
scripts.db:verify: node --import tsx packages/db/scripts/db-verify.ts && node --import tsx scripts/check-migration-discipline.ts
scripts.test:backend: vitest run -c packages/auto-extract/vitest.config.ts && vitest run -c packages/db/vitest.config.ts && vitest run -c packages/backend/vitest.config.ts
scripts.test:e2e: env -u NO_COLOR NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=ExperimentalWarning pnpm build && env -u NO_COLOR NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=ExperimentalWarning E2E_HIDE_WINDOW=1 playwright test -c apps/electron/e2e/playwright.config.ts
scripts.verify: env -u NO_COLOR pnpm lint && env -u NO_COLOR pnpm typecheck && env -u NO_COLOR pnpm type-safety:check && env -u NO_COLOR pnpm arch:check && env -u NO_COLOR NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=ExperimentalWarning pnpm db:verify && env -u NO_COLOR NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=ExperimentalWarning pnpm test:backend && env -u NO_COLOR NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=ExperimentalWarning pnpm test:rtl && env -u NO_COLOR NODE_OPTIONS=--disable-warning=ExperimentalWarning pnpm test:e2e
